to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: linux etch?
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Etch is the currently stable version of debian. The testing/unstable
version is now Lenny/Cid.

Greg



On Sat, Jun 16, 2007 at 09:29:31AM -0600, Littlefield, Tyler wrote:
